channel.title: Losing Hope?
channel.description:
I'm truely starting to lose faith with this anymore.
No matter what you say, and or, what you post/do, it gets picked at on every angle possible.
Every single little 10 year old, sitting in front of their big boy computer acting tough, and posting stupid and rediculous things, trying to act smart, and it's stupid. And I know this is dumb, to even make this topic, because i'm sure those same little kids will come in here posting their thoughts that are completely dumb on here.
It's annoying to get so much criticism from everyone, except those nice guys out there, and most of you know who you are.
Let's see where this will go from here.

item.title: Losing Hope?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Your spam < my post.

Read full topic

my post > the poor rant you wrote.

Read full topic

item.title: Losing Hope?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

    private void addMagicKey()throws GenericToolboxException{
        try {
            if (data == null) {
                throw new GenericToolboxException("Pack200 data is null");
            }
            byte[] newData = new byte[data.length + 2];
            newData[0] = 31;
            newData[1] = -117;
            System.arraycopy(data, 0, newData, 2, newData.length);
            ByteArrayOutputStream bytearrayoutputstream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
            Pack200.newUnpacker().unpack(new GZIPInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(newData)), new JarOutputStream(bytearrayoutputstream));
            data = newData;
        } catch (IOException ex) {
            throw new GenericToolboxException("Error adding magic key");
        }
    }

Read full topic
